title: QA-Kayser Primordial Leaf Certificate: Partial Correspondence
abstract: This certificate documents the partial structural correspondence between Kayser's Primordial Leaf diagram and QA proof tree structures. Unlike C1-C4, this correspondence is WEAKER - some aspects map well (ratio overlap, self-similarity), while others do not (envelope geometry). The certificate honestly records both the successes and limitations.
reason: Envelope geometry mismatch prevents full structural proof
limitation: Leaf envelope is curved; QA separation is linear mod-3 grid

kayser_source.title: The Primordial Leaf
kayser_source.description: Diagram showing harmonic ratios branching from a monochord string, forming an organic leaf-shaped envelope

validated_correspondences.name: Branching Structure
validated_correspondences.finding: Both have non-trivial tree structure, but mechanisms differ

details.kayser: Variable branching based on harmonic ratios

validated_correspondences.name: Ratio Overlap
validated_correspondences.qa_claim: QA digital root space contains these ratios
validated_correspondences.finding: 7/8 Kayser ratios exist in QA's 55 dr_b/dr_e ratios

validated_correspondences.name: Proof Tree Analogy
validated_correspondences.finding: Conceptual parallel, but state space is cyclic not divergent

strong_correspondences: Both systems exhibit tree-like derivation structure
weak_correspondences: Branching mechanisms fundamentally different (harmonic vs arithmetic)
Leaf is divergent; QA state space is cyclic
honest_assessment.conclusion: C5 is a genuine structural analogy but cannot be upgraded to PROVEN due to envelope geometry mismatch

certificate_summary.reason: Envelope geometry mismatch; honest science requires acknowledging limitations
